common.noMatches: Ga go a hwetšwa tšeo di swanelago

profile.title: Profaele ya Modirisi
profile.mustLogin: O swanetše go tsena (sign in) go bona dipeakanyo.
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Laetša ya mathomo kgauswi le phetolelo
profile.filterExplicit: Hlaola diteng tša go hloka maleba
profile.enableReadReceipts: Bula dipontšho tša go balwa (read receipts)
profile.allowExplicitContent: Dumelela diteng tša go hloka maleba
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Disekono pele e phumulwa ka maitirišo
profile.saveError: Phošo: Re paletšwe ke go boloka dipeakanyo
profile.uploadAvatar: Hlatšha senepe se seswa sa profaele
profile.avatarError: Phošo ge go be go hlatswa senepe
profile.noPrivateKey: Ga go na senotlelo sa lekunutu (private key) mo sedirišweng se go se romela.
profile.setBackupPassword: Bea phasewete ya go notlela bekapo ya gago:
profile.importSuccess: Senotlelo sa lekunutu se tsentšhitšwe sedirišweng se.
profile.importFailed: Go tsenya senotlelo go paletšwe (phasewete e fošagetše goba faele e senyegile).
profile.keysRotated: Dinotlelo tše diswa di hlahletšwe, senotlelo sa setšhaba se beilwe.
profile.importKey: Tsenya bekapo ya senotlelo ye e notletšwego
profile.keyDisclaimer: Senotlelo sa gago sa lekunutu ga se tloge sedirišweng se. Romela kopi ye e šireletšwego ka phasewete go e bušetša sedirišweng se sengwe.
profile.themeFreeNotice: O mo go Free — diriša dikgetho tša Letšatši/Ngwedi ka fase. Ntšhafatša go notlolla ditheme tše dintši.
profile.backupTitle: Dibekapo tše di Notletšwego & Go tsamaisanya Didirišwa
profile.backupDesc: Hlama dibekapo tše di notletšwego ka phasewete tša dinotlelo tša gago, gomme o di bušetše sedirišweng se sengwe go tsamaisanya.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Fifetša ge app e se yeo e šomišwago (unfocused)
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ntsebiše ge molaetša wa ka o kopišwa
profile.unfollowFailed: Go emisisa go latela go paletšwe
profile.followHint: Dikanegelo tša bona di tla tšwelela go 'Following' ge ba mpshafatša ka 'Followers' goba 'Public'.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Go na le se sengwe se se paletšwego mo karolong ye.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fetišetša mehala le meletšo ye e tsenago go fono goba imeile yeo e netefaditšwego. Ge o romela, o ka bontšha nomoro ya gago ya Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Kgetha sengwalwa goba phapoši ya poledišano go thoma go bolela

status.filesNote: Go fihla go difaele tše 5. Ka tlwaelo di fela ka diiri tše 24.

sidebar.errorLoading: Go paletšwe ke go laiša dipoledišano

premium.heading: Eya go Premium
premium.description: Notlolla dibopego tša maatla & tloša ditšhišinyo (ads).

auth.headline: Melaetša ya tšhireletšo, ya lefase ka bophara ka phetolelo ya kapejana
auth.description: Go šireletšwa go tloga mafelelong go ya mafelelong, phetolelo ye e šomišwago ke AI, melaetša ya go nyamalala, le meletlo/ bidio.

feature.encryption: Go šireletšwa ka mafelelo ka tlwaelo
feature.disappearing: Melaetša ya go nyamalala & dipontšho tša go balwa
feature.privacy: Sephiri pele. Datha ya gago, taolo ya gago.

auth.desktopTip: O mo khomphuthareng? Skena ka founo go laolla app.

headlineAlt.main: Mosenyi wa melaetša wa tšhireletšo yo

auth.subhead: Melaetša ya sephiri, e šireletšwego, e fetoletšwego — kapejana.
auth.tip: O ka diriša Chatforia seswai le seswai — goba o laolle app bakeng sa maitemogelo a kaone.
auth.scanHint: Skena go laolla app goba bula ka praosara.

footer.doNotSell: O se ke wa rekiša Tshedimošo ya ka

press.title: Boraditaba
press.contact: Ge o na le dipotšišo tša boraditaba, re ngwalele go press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Ge o na le dipotšišo tša boraditaba, re ngwalele go press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ke mosenyi wa melaetša wa tšhireletšo ka phetolelo ya kapejana le E2E, o rulagantšwego go dira gore dipoledišano tša lefase di be tša lekunutu ebile di be bonolo.
press.assetsText: Dilo tša logo, disekirini, le diswantšho tša sehlahisoa (di tla tla kgauswi).

careers.title: Mešomo
careers.intro: Re sehlopha se senyenyane se aga mosenyi wa melaetša wa lefase o bolokegilego. Ge o hlokomela tšhireletšo, phihlelelo, le UX ya boipshino, re ka rata go kwa ka wena.
careers.openRoles: Dikgoro tše bulegilego: Boenjineri (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Sehlahisoa, Thekgo.
careers.apply: Kamoo o ka šupago ka gona: Romela CV/ditoloko go jobs@chatforia.com.
careers.emailCta: Romela CV ya gago ka imeile

about.title: Ka ga Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ke mosenyi wa melaetša wa tšhireletšo, wa maleme a mantši ka go šireletšwa go tloga mafelelong go ya mafelelong, phetolelo ya kapejana, le meletlo/bidio. Maikemišetšo a rena a bonolo: go thuša batho go ikgokaganya—ka sephiri, ka tshireletšo, le ka gare ga maleme a fapafapanego.

values.privacy: Sephiri pele: Go šireletšwa ga E2E ka tlwaelo.
values.access: Phihlelelo go bohle: Phetolelo ya maleme a 100+ ka maitirišo.
values.control: Taolo: Melaetša ya go nyamalala & dipontšho tša go balwa ke boikgethelo.

about.howTitle: Kamoo Chatforia e šomago ka gona
about.howDescription: Melaetša e a šireletšwa sedirišweng sa gago pele e tšwa. Phetolelo, dibekapo, le go tsamaisanya didirišwa di rulagantšwe gore di fokotše seo seva se ka se bonago.

advertise.title: Bapatša le Chatforia
advertise.description: Fihlelela badiriši ba poledišano ka dipeakanyo tše di nago le tlhompho le tša polokego ya marka. Re fana ka ditema tša banner, ditshepetšo, le dipapatšo tša ka gare ga app. Babadi ba Premium ga ba bone ditšhišinyo.

adsense.withPubId: Ga bjale re diriša Google AdSense. Ge o nyaka go re lebanya ka Google Ads, diriša publisher ID {{pubId}} gomme o kgopela managed placement mo diyuniting tše ka mo tlase. Go na le ditshepetšo tša go lebanya—diriša foromo.
adsense.noPubId: Ga bjale re diriša Google AdSense. Go na le ditshepetšo tša go lebanya—diriša foromo ka mo tlase.

advertise.noPlacements: Ga go na diyuniti tše di rulagantšwego ga bjale. Di oketše go ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Go boela ka makga makgolo le nako e telele mo UI ya poledišano
why.brandSafe: Diformete tše bolokegilego go marka; go gatiša go lekanyeditšwe
why.sponsoredMoments: Dikanego tša go sponsara (mohl. 'Thoma Poledišano' modal) di a hwetšagala
why.deals: Ditheko tša go lebanya goba ka lenaneo la AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Re a leboga! Potšišo ya gago e ya go rena. Re tla arabela kgauswi.
form.missingRequired: Hle tlatša leina, imeile, le molaetša.
form.successToast: Re a leboga! Re tla ikgokaganya kgauswi.
form.mailtoInfo: Re bula sešomi sa gago sa imeile go romela potšišo…
form.messageLabel: Re botše ka kampheine ya gago
form.messagePlaceholder: Go lebanya, matšatši, KPIs, dikgetho tša diponelo…

legal.disclaimerStart: Ka go romela, o dumelelana le

upgrade.title: Ntšhafatša
upgrade.subtitle: Kgetha leano le swanetšego wena: tloša ditšhišinyo ka Plus, goba hwetša dibopego tša maatla ka Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Tefelo e tla fela
scheduleBanner.body: O tla boela go Free ka

features.plusAll: Selo se sengwe le sengwe sa Plus
features.ringtones: Diringitone le melodi ya melaetša ya tlwaelo

features.allPremium: Selo se sengwe le sengwe sa Premium
features.sameFeatures: Dibopego tše swanago le tša Kgweding

gettingStarted.title: Go Thoma
gettingStarted.subtitle: O moswa go Chatforia? Tše dingwe tše di khutšo go tla go bontšha dilo tša bohlokwa gore o šome ka metsotso.

alert.text: Tataiso ye e tla gola ge re tsebagatša dibopego tše dingwe. Ge go na le seo se sa lego gona, re tsebiše ka

section2.title: 2) Thoma go romelana melaetša
section2.item1: Hlama DM goba Sehlopha gomme o romele molaetša wa mathomo.
section2.item2: Diriša phetolelo ya kapejana go bolela ka maleme a 100+.
section2.item3: Leka melaetša ya go nyamalala le dipontšho tša go balwa go Profaele → Sephiri.

section3.title: 3) Eya pele
section3.item1Part1: Laola leano la gago letlakaleng la
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = ga go ditšhišinyo, Premium = dibopego ka moka).
section3.item2Part1: Kgokaganya didirišwa tše dingwe gomme o beakanye dibekapo tše di notletšwego go

account.q: Ke hlamang goba go bušetša akhaonto ya ka bjang?
account.a: Laolla app goba diriša wepe, tobetsa “Hlama akhaonto”, netefatša imeile/fono ya gago. Go bušetša, diriša “O lebetše phasewete”.

privacy.q: Na melaetša e šireletšwa go tloga mafelelong?
privacy.a: Ee. Melaetša le mehala di šireletšwa ka E2E ka tlwaelo. Ke wena le moamogedi feela ba ka e bala.

translate.q: Phetolelo ya kapejana e šoma bjang?
translate.a: Bula “Phetolelo ka maitirišo” go Dipeakanyo → Ponagalo & Polelo. Re fetolela mo sedirišweng ge go kgonagala, goba ka di-API tše di šireletšwego ka metadata e fokolago.

contact.a: Re ngwalele go support@chatforia.com. Tsenya diswantšho le mofuta wa app.

contact.title: Ikgokaganye le Rena
contact.successMsg: Re a leboga—sehlopha sa rena se tla araba ka imeile.
contact.errorSend: Ga se gwa kgonega go romela. Hle romela imeile go support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Pholisi ye e hlaloša kamoo Chatforia (“rena”, “rena ka moka”) e kgoboketšago, e šomišago, le go abelana tshedimošo ge o šomiša di-app le ditirelo tša rena. Re rulagantše Chatforia go fokotša datha yeo re ka e bonago.

infoWeCollect.title: Tshedimošo ye re e kgoboketšago
infoWeCollect.account: Tshedimošo ya akhaonto (mohl. imeile/fono) go hlama le go šireletša akhaonto ya gago.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Dikagare tše di notletšwego (melaetša/mehala) di šireletšwa ka E2E; ga re kgone go di bala.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Ditlaleletšo tša go šoma/ go phunya bjalo ka di-logs tša go thubega, mohuta wa sedirišwa, goba tsebo e nnyane ya tshekatsheko go kaonafatša tshepetšo.

howWeUse.title: Kamoo re šomišago tshedimošo ka gona
howWeUse.provide: Go fana le go šireletša tirelo (auth, go lemoga spam/ tshenyo).
howWeUse.improve: Go kaonafatša dibopego (boleng bja phetolelo, tshepetšo).

sharing.title: Go abelana
sharing.body: Ga re reki datha ya botho. Re ka abelana datha e fokolago le ba šomišani (mohl. dikitiso, tshekatsheko) ka dikonteraka tše tiilego.

rights.title: Ditokelo tša gago
rights.body: Go ya ka tikologo ya gago (mohl. GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), o ka kgopela go tsena, go lokiša, go phumola, goba go itšholla go go šomišwa ga tše dingwe. Ikgokaganye: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Polokelo ya datha & tšhireletšo
retention.body: Re boloka tšeo di nyakegago feela go šomiša tirelo, gomme re diriša tšhireletšo ya maemo a intasteri. Dikagare tša E2E ga di kgone go notlolwa ke rena.

children.title: Bana
children.body: Chatforia ga e lebane le bana ba ka fase ga 13 (goba go ya ka molao wa tikologo ya gago).

changes.title: Diphetošo
changes.body: Re tla bea mpshafatšo mo gomme ra fetola letšatši la “E mpshafaditšwe”.

intro.body: Ka go šomiša Chatforia o dumelelana le Melao ye. Ge o sa dumele, hle o se ke wa šomiša tirelo.

accounts.title: Diakhaonto
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Fana ka tshedimošo ya nnete gomme o čhale dinomoro tša gago ka tshireletšo.
accounts.itemResponsibility: O na le maikarabelo ka ditiro tša akhaonto ya gago.

acceptableUse.title: Tšhomišo ye e amogelegago
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ga go molaetša wa molao o gobogilego goba o sa dumelelanego; ga go spam goba tshenyo ya dikgoma.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Re ka emiša/ fedisa ge go robja melao.

yourContent.title: Dikagare tša gago
yourContent.body: O boloka ditokelo tša gago mo dikagareng tša gago. O re nea ditokelo tše di nyakegago go šoma tirelo (mohl. go laetša, polokelo, phetolelo).

disclaimer.title: Dikgopolo & maikarabelo
disclaimer.body: Tirelo e fiwa “bjalo ka ge e le” ntle le tiišetšo. Go ya ka moo molao o dumelelago, Chatforia ga e ikarabele ka tshenyo ya go se felele goba ya ka ntle.

changes.title: Diphetošo
changes.body: Re ka mpshafatša melao; go tšwela pele ka go šomiša ka morago ga diphetošo go ra gore o a dumela.

doNotSell.title: O se ke wa Rekisa goba go Abelana Tshedimošo ya ka
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ga e reki tshedimošo ya botho. Baagi ba California ba ka tswela pele ba romela dikopo go ya ka CPRA ka konope ka mo tlase.

cookies.title: Dipeakanyo tša Dikuki
cookies.body: Chatforia e diriša dikuki tše di fokolago (mohl. session, tšhireletšo). Ga re diriše dikuki tša ditšhišinyo tša batho ba boraro. Laola dikuki ka dipeakanyo tša praosara ya gago.
